body.p: Wi-Fi Protected Access (WPA) support in Gentoo Linux is being revisited, with its maintainer calling for comments, writes this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. Two Gentoo developers will be present at India's major FOSS event in Bangalore starting tomorrow, the Japanese Gentooists are gearing up for their traditional Bonenkai year-end party, and a collection of press clippings complete this edition. Plus, of course, the regular bugzilla statistics and security announcements sections. Have fun reading your GWN!
